entities.Accident insurance: Helping you cover expenses after an accident.
entities.emergency treatment: Emergency treatment is one of the covered circumstances under accident insurance policies.
entities.burns: Burns are explicitly listed as a covered circumstance under accident insurance policies.
entities.dislocations: Dislocations are included as one of the covered injuries in accident insurance policies.
entities.fractures: Fractures are explicitly covered under accident insurance policies.
entities.hospital confinement: Hospital confinement is a condition explicitly covered by accident insurance policies.
entities.surgery: Surgery is explicitly covered under accident insurance policies as one of the qualifying circumstances.
entities.broken leg: A broken leg is highlighted in an example as a qualifying accident that results in covered expenses.
entities.Accidental Death: Benefit provided for death resulting from an accident.
entities.Dismemberment - Hand: Compensation for loss of a hand due to an accident.
entities.Dismemberment - Foot: Compensation for loss of a foot due to an accident.
entities.Dismemberment - Sight: Compensation for loss of sight due to an accident.
entities.Dismemberment - Thumb/Index Finger: Compensation for the loss of a thumb or index finger on the same hand.
entities.Dismemberment - Four Fingers: Compensation for the loss of four fingers on the same hand.
entities.Dismemberment - All Toes: Compensation for the loss of all toes on the same foot.
entities.Quadriplegia: Compensation for loss of movement in all four limbs due to an accident.
entities.Hemiplegia: Compensation for loss of movement on one side of the body due to an accident.
entities.Paraplegia: Compensation for loss of movement in the lower half of the body due to an accident.
entities.Burns (2nd Degree/3rd Degree): Compensation for burns classified as second or third degree.
entities.Burns - Skin Graft: Compensation for skin grafts required due to burns.
entities.Concussions: Concussions have a benefit of $200 under the accident coverage policy.
entities.Eye Injury: Eye injuries are covered with a benefit of $300 under the accident policy.
entities.Gun Shot Wound: Gun shot wounds are covered with a benefit of $100 to $750.
entities.Laceration: Lacerations are covered with a schedule benefit of up to $100 to $200.
entities.Knee Cartilage: Injuries to knee cartilage are covered with a benefit of $500.
entities.Ruptured Disc With Surgical Repair: Ruptured discs with surgical repair are covered with a benefit of $500.
entities.Prosthetic Device/Artificial Limb: Prosthetic devices or artificial limbs are covered with a benefit of $500 for one limb and $1,000 for two or more.
entities.Hernia: A condition covered under accident insurance policies with a payout of $200.
entities.Tendon/Ligament/Rotator Cuff: A type of injury covered under the accident insurance policy with specified benefit amounts for treatment.
entities.Traumatic Brain Injury: A nondegenerative, noncongenital injury to the brain covered if it requires hospital confinement for 48 hours or more.
entities.Accidental Dismemberment: A condition eligible for benefits if modifications are necessary due to the injury.
